meanings.definition: A molecule that can be bonded to other identical molecules to form a polymer.
meanings.sent1: Monomers are like building blocks that join together to create a polymer.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how monomers combine to make long chains in polymers.
meanings.sent3: The monomers at the polymer party were excited to link up and form a chain.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chemistry, monomers are the essential puzzle pieces for creating polymers.
meanings.sent5: The classroom model demonstrated how monomers connect to form a strong polymer structure.

meanings.definition: A single unit of a polymer.
meanings.sent1: Each monomers contributes to the overall structure of the polymer.
meanings.sent2: The monomers in this plastic are tightly packed together.
meanings.sent3: The monomers in the polymer race were determined to stick together till the end.
meanings.sent4: The monomers stood out as individual units in the long polymer chain.
meanings.sent5: The monomers' role is crucial in forming the polymer's structure and properties.
